notes.text:
I used to run 3 saffiras and 3 senjus but I was always getting unlucky games on kog rankup so I just tested the version of a friend of mine, whose idea was to bait with that skelengel set turn 1 to make people believe they faced a sylvan grit deck 
I didn't get to use it on turn 1 but I thought the idea was cool
So I'll still post his version of the deck as I actually kogged this time using his decklist and not mine
But the games didn't really change that much anyway so I guess all the versions could somehow work lol
